author: Gino D'Acampo
method: Place the almonds, garlic, basil, and parsley into a food processor and blend to a smooth paste. Season with salt and freshly ground black pepper. Stir the pesto into the cooked pasta in a serving bowl and serve garnished with the fresh basil sprig.
